name: A Dragonfly Dreams
description:
Inspired by the rain of late – some designs have taken on that ’streaming water’  effect which I think is really gorgeous. For this piece, I imagined a dragonfly taking shelter in the rain, and while waiting for the rain to stop, drifting into daydreams.

A handmade clay bead with the impression of a butterfly takes the focal, as slim pewter tubes separated by little Czech crystals rain down. A clay flower shelters the little pewter dragonfly, with pewter leafy branches waving above it. The entire pendant measures 3″ down and comes with a 16″ rhodium chain.

Default price is in USD. Singapore customers please contact me at paigealexis@gmail.com to purchase.

name: The Lady
description:
A Mel’s Signature Design, this beautiful pendant is entirely handwired, wrapped with Swarovski crystals, pewter charms, polymer clay roses and features in its centre a polymer clay print of Lady Godiva’s famous march.

Pendant measures 4″ down, 3″ across. A complimentary chain of 16" will be provided. 

Default price is in USD. Singapore customers please contact me at paigealexis@gmail.com to purchase.
